docs.text: College Projects First Edition Getting Started This website contains my complete college projects. More Information For a clear commit history, I rebase my repository regularly. Therefore, if you have forked the repository before, consider re-forking it again. For more information, please visit my GitHub . License Licensed under the MIT License.

docs.text: This website contains my complete college projects.

docs.title: License

docs.text: Primary colors Default: Teal Click on a tile to change the primary color of the theme: Red Pink Purple Deep Purple Indigo Blue Light Blue Cyan Teal Green Light Green Lime Yellow Amber Orange Deep Orange Brown Grey Blue Grey White var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("button[data-md-color-primary]"); Array.prototype.forEach.call(buttons, function(button) { button.addEventListener("click", function() { document.body.dataset.mdColorPrimary = this.dataset.mdColorPrimary; }) }) Accent colors Default: Blue Click on a tile to change the accent color of the theme: Red Pink Purple Deep Purple Indigo Blue Light Blue Cyan Teal Green Light Green Lime Yellow Amber Orange Deep Orange var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("button[data-md-color-accent]"); Array.prototype.forEach.call(buttons, function(button) { button.addEventListener("click", function() { document.body.dataset.mdColorAccent = this.dataset.mdColorAccent; }) })
docs.title: Color

docs.text: Default: Teal Click on a tile to change the primary color of the theme: Red Pink Purple Deep Purple Indigo Blue Light Blue Cyan Teal Green Light Green Lime Yellow Amber Orange Deep Orange Brown Grey Blue Grey White var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("button[data-md-color-primary]"); Array.prototype.forEach.call(buttons, function(button) { button.addEventListener("click", function() { document.body.dataset.mdColorPrimary = this.dataset.mdColorPrimary; }) })

docs.text: Default: Blue Click on a tile to change the accent color of the theme: Red Pink Purple Deep Purple Indigo Blue Light Blue Cyan Teal Green Light Green Lime Yellow Amber Orange Deep Orange var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("button[data-md-color-accent]"); Array.prototype.forEach.call(buttons, function(button) { button.addEventListener("click", function() { document.body.dataset.mdColorAccent = this.dataset.mdColorAccent; }) })

docs.text: Introduction | Source Code Easy Non Linear Equation Solver is a console application and my first project on java.It is developed to solve non linear equation already defined in application by using Numerical Techniques This application implements following numerical techniques: Bisection Method False Position Method Secant Method Newton Raphson Method Screenshots Main Screen Bisection Method False Position Method Secant Method Newton's Raphson Method Not Found Screen
docs.title: Easy Non Linear Equation Solver

docs.text: Easy Non Linear Equation Solver is a console application and my first project on java.It is developed to solve non linear equation already defined in application by using Numerical Techniques This application implements following numerical techniques: Bisection Method False Position Method Secant Method Newton Raphson Method

docs.text: Introduction | Source Code Easy Media Player is a desktop application developed by using Java FX FX supported CSS. Features: Good User Interface Easily play .mp4,.mp3, etc. file Playlist control media file play Control buttons such (Play,Pause,Stop,Volume Control) Double Click on video then full screen video play. Screenshots Main Screen Playing Video Playlist Control
docs.title: Easy Media Player

docs.text: Easy Media Player is a desktop application developed by using Java FX FX supported CSS. Features: Good User Interface Easily play .mp4,.mp3, etc. file Playlist control media file play Control buttons such (Play,Pause,Stop,Volume Control) Double Click on video then full screen video play.

docs.text: Introduction | Source Code Easy Lend Care is an android application developed by using Android SDK + Java + XML and this is my first android project under GITSS Nepal. Features: Good User Interface Useful for small shop to save their lend information of individual customer It also calculate lend percentage Easy to use. Screenshots Main Screen Add User Login Main View Detail View

docs.text: Introduction | Source Code Easy FM Tuner is an android application developed by using Android SDK + Java + XML and this is my second android project under GITSS Nepal. Features: Good User Interface It can play FM station online using Network Streaming Technology It provide FM stations list dynamically from server using JSON-P(JSON Processing). Easy to use. Screenshots Main Screen Playing FM Radio List of FM Radio
docs.title: Easy FM Tuner

docs.text: Introduction | Source Code Easy Business Manager is a desktop application developed by using Java + MS Access DB + JDBC + ODBC Bridge. This is minor project(group and closed source) project. Features: Good User Interface Help to handle business daily transaction (sale, purchase, payment,etc) It provides dynamic financial reports. Backup data. Screenshots Splash Screen Create User Application Features
